  • Hep B protocol – example

Hep B screening and vaccination protocol for Slovak Roma population in Sheffield

A small number of practices in Sheffield devised this Hep B screening an vaccination protocol in response to the risks of the growing Roma Slovak population. This protocol outlines the process of Hep B screening, household management of active Hep B and interpreting Hep B test results.

Contributed by

  • Dr Brown

    Sheffield

  • Dr Smith

    Manchester

Download example

Authors: Dr Alicia Vedio: Infectious Diseases, Royal Hallamshire Hospital Sheffield; Dr Helena Ellam and Dr Raza: Virologists, Northern General Hospital Sheffield. Ann Gregory. Practice Nurse, Page Hall Medical Centre. anngregory@nhs.net
